title: Council Decision of 19 December 1991 extending the period of application of Decision 82/530/EEC authorizing the United Kingdom to permit the Isle of Man authorities to apply a system of special import licences to sheepmeat and beef and veal
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 19 December 1991  extending the period of application of Decision 82/530/EEC authorizing the United Kingdom to permit the Isle of Man authorities to apply a system of special import licences to sheepmeat and beef and veal   (91/657/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 2 of Decision 82/530/EEC is hereby replaced by the following:
'Article 2
The Decision shall apply until 31 March 1992.'
This Decision is addressed to the United Kingdom.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1991. For the Council
The President
P. DANKERT
(1) OJ No L 68, 15. 3. 1973, p. 1. Regulation amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1174/86 (OJ No L 107, 24. 4. 1986, p. 12). (2) OJ No L 234, 9. 8. 1982, p. 7. Decision as last amended by Decision No 88/5504/EEC (OJ No L 273, 5. 10. 1988, p. 1).  (3) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1668, p. 24. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1628/91 (OJ No L 150, 15. 6. 1991, p. 16). (4) OJ No L 289, 7. 10. 1989, p. 1. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 1741/91 (OJ No L 163, 26. 6. 1991, p.  41).
